name: Eternus
subtitle: Blade of the First Prince

abilities.name: Veins of Black Lightning
abilities.description: Reborn in the Cursed Skies above the realms, Eternus's soul is tethered to the Mortal Realms through the dark magics of his master; whenever he is struck down, a flash of black lightning sees him stand defiant once more.
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability if it has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. Add 1 to the roll if a friendly Be'lakor is on the battlefield. On an 8+, set up a replacement unit on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Network of Spies
abilities.timing: Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit within 12" of this unit
abilities.description: Eternus commands a legion of agents and operatives to ensure he is always one step ahead of his enemies.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the enemy unit is in combat with a friendly Chaos Legionnaires or Chaos Furies unit. On a 5+, that command has no effect. The command still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost.

regimentOptions: 0-1 Ruinous Champion, Any Slaves to Darkness
notes: This Hero can join Be'lakor's regiment.
